title: Feature request: Hot keys
author: Fahd4world
body_snippet: It will be nice to add hot keys, example two keys to Reconnect to expired session, instead of right click its tab and click on reconnect, same for the rest options like disconnect.

comments.author: farosch
comments.snippet:
Implementing hotkeys is a feature that is really often requested and that will definitively be implemented into mRemoteNG sometime.
There are currently no plans on implementing hotkeys in the foreseeable future.
